com.nutiteq.editable

Class EditableMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • android.opengl.GLSurfaceView
          • com.nutiteq.MapView
            • com.nutiteq.editable.EditableMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

    public class EditableMapView
extends com.nutiteq.MapView
    Special MapView which enables to have editing interaction of vector objects on map. Can be created with layout XML
    Author:
    mtehver
